description: This Amendment 001 is raised to publish questions from Bidders and responses from Canada. Please see the newly uploaded Bidder Q&A document. All other terms and conditions remain unchanged.
tags: Services de nettoyage et de concierge
full_summary:
# Janitorial Cleaning Services

## Solicitation Details:

* **Reference Number:** cb-505-61207419
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** SPMD-24-JAN1/A
* **Publication Date:** 2024-07-04
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-18T14:30:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-07-18

## Contract Details:

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-08-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-07-31
* **Location of Work:** North York Municipality, Greater Toronto Area, Ontario, Canada
* **Duration:** One (1) year with options to extend

## Description of Requirement:

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites submissions for Janitorial Cleaning Services to support the Seized Property Management Directorate (SPMD). The requirement includes weekly routine janitorial cleaning services and additional or emergency cleaning as outlined in the solicitation documents.

## Selection Criteria:

* **Evaluation Criteria:** The contract will be awarded to the Bidder who wins the RFQ, which is based on the lowest price

## Important Notes:
* Bidders must either hold the required security clearance or obtain it prior to contract award.
* The Domestic and International Trade Agreements are not applicable to this requirement.
* Electronic Bid Bond as supported by eSftpLinks are not permitted

## Supporting Documents

A list of attached supporting documents can be found at the end of this announcement.

## Contact Information:

* Contact Person: Daphne Klassen-Hayes
* Contact Email: [daphne.klassen-hayes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.klassen-hayes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: (613) 296-0230
* Contact Address: 140 O'Connor Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R5, Canada.

Note: Even though the tender has expired, I maintained the details without modifying them. This way the original information is preserved for archival purposes or in-case a revised version of this tender is announced in the future. 

removed the **notes** tab to improve readable format. formatted it in markdown according to readability rules. only capitalize the first character of the first word of most headings,keep the title in caps. NZKC. Aug 24
